title: Online- Virtual Website /Control Room Assistant
job_overview:
* This is a work from home opportunity !!

You will be responsible for the following:

Overseeing the guidance of our ai technology - (on the back end of our website)

Supporting our team of drivers with their general enquiries - (using our software) 

Assisting Restaurant owners & their staff with their general enquiries - (through web calls)

Assisting our customer base with their general enquiries  - (through web calls)

Working with other departments  across our business to  complete tasks. - (using our software)

SKILLS REQUIRED -

Good level - Written & Spoken English 

Fair Level -Technology Skills

High Level - Customer Care Skills

 ESSENTIALS -

FULL INTERNET  CONNECTIVITY 24/7 365

Fully Functioning Modern Laptop 

Located within an area offering  365 days a year electricity supply

You must be available to work hours that may suit Irish / UK operating times.
